@description.name: @description
@description.body: Measures JavaScript execution and rendering time for singular or repeated operations.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Repeatedly runs code and measures execution and rendering times

@param.name: @param
@param.body: msg {String} Description of the measured operation

@param.name: @param
@param.body: callback {Function} Callback containing the code to be measured
@param.description: Callback containing the code to be measured

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
finalize {Function} Finalize function called once after measuring,
 e.g. for cleanup. Will not be measured.
@param.description:
Finalize function called once after measuring,
 e.g. for cleanup. Will not be measured.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: iterations {Number} Number of times to execute the callback
@param.description: Number of times to execute the callback

@param.name: @param
@param.body: displayIterations {Number?} Iterations to be displayed instead of iterations
@param.description: Iterations to be displayed instead of iterations

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Repeatedly runs code for a given amount of time and measures completed iterations

@param.name: @param
@param.body: msg {String} Description of the measured operation

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
prepare {Function} A function that will be called before every
 iteration. Its execution time is not included in the measurement
@param.description:
A function that will be called before every
 iteration. Its execution time is not included in the measurement

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
callback {Function} Callback containing the code to be measured.
 Must return the number of completed iterations.
@param.description:
Callback containing the code to be measured.
 Must return the number of completed iterations.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
finalize {Function} Finalize function called once after measuring,
 e.g. for cleanup. Will not be measured.
@param.description:
Finalize function called once after measuring,
 e.g. for cleanup. Will not be measured.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: time {Number} Amount of time in milliseconds

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Executes a given callback function once and measures JavaScript execution and rendering time

@param.name: @param
@param.body: msg {String} Description of the measured operation

@param.name: @param
@param.body: callback {Function} Callback containing the code to be measured
@param.description: Callback containing the code to be measured

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
finalize {Function} Finalize function called once after measuring,
 e.g. for cleanup. Will not be measured.
@param.description:
Finalize function called once after measuring,
 e.g. for cleanup. Will not be measured.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: displayIterations {Number?} Iterations to be displayed instead of iterations
@param.description: Iterations to be displayed instead of iterations

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
maxTime {Number?} Maximum amount of time the test will run. Only used
 for {@link #measureIterations}. If undefined, the test will be aborted after
 ten seconds.
@param.description:
Maximum amount of time the test will run. Only used
 for {@link #measureIterations}. If undefined, the test will be aborted after
 ten seconds.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: msg {String} Description of the measured operation

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ownTime {Number} JavaScript execution time in ms

@param.name: @param
@param.body: renderTime {Number} Dom rendering time in ms
